title: France panorama. [No. 71/33]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: G.E. Clancier - the literary prize awarded by the French Academy. Electronics and sculpture - Potin’s electronic sculptures. 2. Athletics - the French track and field championships. 3. Holograms and aerodynamics - a new aerodynamic visualisation process. 4. Boucher - the Francois Boucher canvases at the Louvre.
